title: Converse presents #Pleasecharge
description:
#Pleasecharge features the European Converse crew. Remy Taveira, Harry Lintell, Felipe Bartolome, Jerome Campbell, Paul Grund, Greg Cuadrado, Kevin Rodrigues, David Stenström, Javier Mendizabal, Carlos Cardenosa, Danny Sommerfeld, Daniel Pannemann & Sylvain Tognelli.
Filmed across many cities in Spain, France, UK, The Netherlands and Germany

Filmed by Ben Chadourne & James Cruickshank
Music byJean Louis Huhta
